{"step_by_step_thinking": "Yes, we can predict which head and neck cancer survivors develop fears of recurrence. Fears of recurrence are common among cancer survivors, and several factors can contribute to the development of these fears. Some of the factors that can predict the development of fears of recurrence include the stage and severity of the cancer, the type of treatment received, the presence of other comorbidities, the level of social support, and the individual's psychological and emotional resilience. By assessing these factors, healthcare professionals can identify those survivors who are at a higher risk of developing fears of recurrence.", "answer_choice": "A"}
